definition: Li Qingzhao (1084-c. 1151), southern Song female poet

surname Li

sentences.english: Li chingchao was the greatest poetess of China.
sentences.chinese: 李清照是中国最伟大的女词人。

sentences.english: Zhu Sbu- zhen was a woman poet in Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 朱淑贞是与李清照同时的女诗词家。

sentences.english: "People than yellow flower thin" li qingzhao, bumpy life let a person gasp in admiration.
sentences.chinese: “人比黄花瘦”李清照，坎坷的人生让人赞叹。

sentences.english: There is a Qingzhao Li Memorial Hall in Jinan City.
sentences.chinese: 在济南市趵突泉公园北部，有李清照纪念堂。

sentences.english: Li Qingzhao keeps word 49, has edits this"Shu Yu word."
sentences.chinese: 李清照共留词四十九首，有辑本《漱玉词》。

sentences.english: Be badly in need of Li Qingzhao and sentimental and grieved Li Yu poem word , have annotation more well.
sentences.chinese: 急需李清照和李煜伤感和悲痛的诗词，有注解更好。

sentences.english: Li Qingzhao's Ci can be divided into two periods.
sentences.chinese: 李清照的词创作，分为前后两个时期。
